title: What do I have to do to improve my math and English? - Quora

response.answer_text: Improving English- Read anything that interest you in English. Like- magazine, newspaper, comics, novel, etc. 2. Apart from reading to speak fluently, you can practice speaking in front of mirrors or record your voice and try to analyse it.  3. Watch English movies with no subtitles and watch English news and try to mimic the news being delivered.  Improving Maths- Generally, it is seen the people who are good in maths are very fond of numbers. But, its not true for all and for those who are not at all in love with maths it can be said maths is just another subject. When learning any new formula always try practicing 3 problem on the same day and at least other three a day after. 2. In maths it’s said to enjoy real maths try solving question formulated by, and try to relate the real world problem in term of maths.

For doing good in maths you should first go through the basic principles behind any theorem or topic then you should do numericals and to improve your skills in english you should write daily essay or article regarding some topic and get it checked by your teacher.
